outputs.output_descr: Crimean institutions (at both republican and local levels) and partnerships strengthened for effective policy development, strategies operationalisation and projects design and implementation
Local development funds absorption capacities increased and institutional architecture and mechanisms developed
Crimea recommended as one of possible best practices in regional development mechanism for other regions of Ukraine

The mission of the project is to fully develop governing, managerial and operational capacities of the autonomously operating Regional Development Agency in Crimea, so it is able to successfully attract investors' and donors' funds to fulfil Crimea's regional strategic development Goals, and fulfil effective role of planning and coordinating regional development actions in Crimea. By the end of the project the Agency will be a leading agent contributing to the FDI promotion in Crimea, project development, and analytical monitoring of the strategy implementation in Crimea.
The project will achieve its goals through 3 areas of actions: 1) building RDA legal structure and business procedures 2) enhancing human resources capacities, and 3) building strong partnerships with other development agents in Crimea and Ukraine
outputs.output_title: Support to the RDA of Crimea
